definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Thus the whole thing came out.
The marquis was enlightened and knew clearly what he should do.
sentences.chinese: 昭僖候这下子想通了，清楚地知道自己应该怎么做。

sentences.english: Henry received a blow on the head that I thought had done for him.
sentences.chinese: 亨利头上挨了一下子，我想这下子已经送了他的命。

sentences.english: This time he has made good.
The hare and the tortoise by this time had become pretty good friends and they did some thinking together.
sentences.chinese: 这下子，兔子和乌龟成了惺惺相惜的好朋友。

sentences.english: " I'm thinking, "Oh my gosh, I sound like a golden retriever.
sentences.chinese: 这下子，我的声音听上去也象是一个金毛狗了。
这下子就变成一场较量了。

sentences.english: And now Hedgehog can't fit into her nest.
sentences.chinese: 这下子，小刺猬的小巢不再合适了。

sentences.english: Then Tom Thumb lost his temper.
sentences.chinese: 这下子汤姆大拇发大脾气了。

sentences.english: This sucks. Now I have to adventure with a bunch of total skeezy losers.
sentences.chinese: 这下子，我得和这堆乌合之众一起冒险了。

sentences.english: And I'll get to sleep at night.
sentences.chinese: 我这下子可以高枕无忧了。

sentences.english: Now the colt could increasingly positive.
sentences.chinese: 这下子小马就愈加积极了。

definition: in a short while/all at once/all of a sudden
